name: Police Escape
description:
An FPS/Platformer similar to games like Mirrors Edge made for the MiniJam 60.

The pausing mechanic is implemented through slow motion, where the player has a limited amount of slow motion which regenerates when it is not being used.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Mouse1 - Fire Gun

F - Toggle Slow Motion

Known Bugs - Camera tilting whilst wallrunning and slowmotion transitions are REALLY slow due to unity's kool way of building games, will fix soon.
